text:
AI is eating junior consultants for 20 dollars.

Introducing Perplexity Labs:

☑ Does 10-minute research sprints, self-supervised
☑ Builds dashboards without Plotly knowledge
☑ Creates reports with actual citations
☑ 50 queries monthly for Pro users
☑ Exports to PDF, not just screenshots
☑ Writes the code and runs it too
☑ Files organized in one Assets tab
☑ From CSV to interactive charts
☑ Works while you're in other meetings
☑ Natural language to web apps
☑ Doesn't just search - actually builds things

If no one hires juniors, how juniors become seniors?
